name: It Is My Duty To Clean Up This Beach
name_original: It Is My Duty To Clean Up This Beach
description:
A game made for I Can't Draw But Want To Make A Game (Again) game jam.

The beach is covered with all sorts of litter. It is your turn to bring justice upon the beach.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

LMB - Use

If you're stuck or find some levels too hard to beat, you can check out the full playthrough here
